notes: Spacious, modern unfurnished apartment in excellent condition with high-quality finishes including recessed lighting, elegant pendant fixtures, and polished tile floors. The unit features an open-plan living/dining area with modern kitchen including stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar. Good natural light from large windows. For baby safety: the apartment appears flat with no visible stairs, no balcony hazards visible, and rounded wall corners. Being on floor 3 of a 20-story building confirms elevator access.
